# QMUI

# 导入

Gradle Scripts\build.grade(Moudule: app)

dependencies {
    implementation 'com.qmuiteam:qmui:2.0.0-alpha07'
}

# 使用

\res\values\styles.xml

<resources>
  <style name="AppTheme" parent="QMUI">

  </style>
</resources>
